seo.description: Martin Kollár - a web developer focused on innovation and creativity. An overview of my experience with programming, projects, and experience in the field of web development.
seo.keywords: Martin Kollar, Web Developer, Programmer, Programming Experience, Project Management, Full Stack Developer, Software Engineering, Web Design, User Experience, Frontend Development, Backend Development, Application Development, Coding Projects

theme.title: Theme
theme.toggle: Switch between light and dark theme

home.title: Home
home.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in full-stack web application development, passionate about creating efficient solutions. I enjoy working across different fields, including mobile and game development, and I'm always eager to explore new technologies and push my skills further.

about.title: About me
about.description: Welcome to the about me page

sections.title: First lines of code
sections.description: In 2019, I started programming for the first time and learned the basics of programming in Python. After entering high school, I started to devote myself intensively to programming and web development.

sections.title: Started coding consistently
sections.description: Experimented with multiple languages, game engines, and frameworks. Started exploring ways to make my code cleaner and efficient.

sections.title: Got Job at Binary Confidence s.r.o.
sections.description: Got my first job as a backend developer in Binary Confidence s.r.o. Worked with technologies such as Ansible, Hyper-V, Linux, etc.. Met with new concepts, technologies, interesting projects, and great people, furthering my knowledge.

sections.title: Graduated highschool
sections.description: For my graduation project I worked on my own first large-scale fullstack web application. I learned a lot about web development, and I was able to apply my knowledge in a real-world project. I also learned a lot about project architecture, cloud and deployment.

interestsAndHobbies.title: Interests and hobbies
interestsAndHobbies.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut lab

web_development.title: Vývoj webových aplikácií
web_development.description: Vývoj webových aplikácií zahŕňa vytváranie interaktívnych a dynamických webových stránok a aplikácií pomocou technológií ako HTML, CSS, JavaScript a rôzne frameworky ako React, Angular alebo Vue.js.

mobile_development.title: Vývoj mobilných aplikácií
mobile_development.description: Vývoj mobilných aplikácií zahŕňa vytváranie aplikácií pre mobilné zariadenia, ako sú smartfóny a tablety. Môže zahŕňať natívny vývoj pre iOS a Android, alebo použitie multiplatformových frameworkov ako Flutter.

game_development.title: Vývoj hier
game_development.description: Vývoj hier zahŕňa tvorbu interaktívnych herných zážitkov pomocou rôznych technológií a nástrojov. Môže zahŕňať programovanie, dizajn, animáciu a zvukovú produkciu.

dev_ops.title: DevOps
dev_ops.description: DevOps je prax, ktorá spája vývojárov a prevádzkový tím s cieľom zlepšiť spoluprácu a efektivitu pri vývoji a nasadzovaní softvéru. Využíva automatizáciu, kontinuálnu integráciu a nasadenie na zlepšenie kvality a rýchlosti dodania softvéru.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: My specialization is mainly in fullstack web application development and their deployment to production on the cloud, but I am also actively involved in other areas such as backend development for applications. Furthermore, I have worked in game and mobile development.

bulletPoints: Automated application deployment and infrastructure management using Ansible playbooks, including server configuration, database setup, and monitoring tools implementation
Designed and implemented multiple Python microservices with REST APIs, including systems for data processing, user authentication, and external service integrations
Developed comprehensive automated testing suite simulating user behavior using Python, PyQt5, and Selenium, reducing manual testing time by 70%
Developed responsive web applications using Next.js with TypeScript, implemented SSR/SSG, performance optimization and SEO, including external API integrations
Deployed and managed production applications on Google Firebase platform, configured CI/CD pipelines, performance monitoring, and automatic scaling
Designed and implemented NoSQL database architecture in Firestore, including security rules, indexing, and query optimization for high performance

contact.text: In case of interest, do not hesitate to contact me:
